basics.name: Shashvat Mehta
basics.summary: A student at San Mateo Highschool with a passion for learning new things in all areas from technology to cooking

work.name: Freelance 3D Modeler
work.summary: I enjoy doing freelance 3D modelling in my freetime outside of school. I have worked on a variety of projects ranging from logo design to techincal 3D animations of lab equipment such as microscopes

work.name: 3D Modeling Tutor
work.summary: I provide tutoring sessions for students interested in learning 3D modeling and animation using software like Blender

work.name: Vortex Robotics Coach
work.summary: I coach the new members of the Vortex Robotics team, helping them prepare for competitions and develop their skills in robotics

volunteer.summary: I held multiple classes at the Foster City Library to teach young kids in the basics of programming and robotics
Lead the Vortex Robotics as co-captain from 2022-2024 to the FIRST Tech Challenge Regional Championships

awards.title: FIRST Tech Challange Inspire Award
awards.summary: The Insipire award is the top award in the FIRST Tech Challenge, it is given to the team that best embodies the spirit of the competition and the values of FIRST. I was the co-captain of my team, Vortex Robotics, that won this award in 2022

projects.name: Lab Equipment 3D Animation
projects.summary: Created a 3D animation describing the a new algroithm for imaging cells called recOrder designed by Shalin Mehta at CZ Biohub
